http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif BNRG List BNRG List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=BNRG&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BNRG.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-01T21:56:26Z Ganesalingam Narenthiran 2015-03-01T21:56:20+00:00 2015-03-01T21:56:20+00:00 EVD, VP shunt and ETV: guidance for ventriculostomy https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BNRG;85d2d646.1503 Babaji<br><br>Dear All,whether or not image-guidance should be used in ventriculostomy during insertion of VP shunt, EVD (in head injury) and endoscopic third ventriculostomy remains controversial. Could you please consider completing a survey on your current practice, relating to this topic; it can be found at:<br>http://goo.gl/forms/TvtQmDAzgC<br>Should you enter your email address in the survey, I will inform you the results in due course.<br>Thank you very much in advance and warmest regards!Naren<br>G Narenthiran FRCS(SN) Dr Frederick A Boop MDLocum Consultant Neurosurgeon Professor and J. T. Robertson ChairmanThe Royal London Hospital Department of NeurosurgeryLondon University of Tennessee Health [...] Ganesalingam Narenthiran 2014-12-14T11:37:12+00:00 2014-12-14T11:37:12+00:00 FW: IFNE-JSNE NEUROENDOS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCOPY WORKSHOP-N\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdAPLES, ITALY, JANUARY26-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd28, 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BNRG;88b8998c.1412 Date: Sun, 14 Dec 2014 12:24:29 +0100<br>Subject: IFNE-JSNE NEUROENDOS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCOPY WORKSHOP-N\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdAPLES, ITALY, JANUARY26-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd28, 2015<br>From: giuseppe.cinalli@gmail.com<br>To: giuseppe.cinalli@gmail.com<br><br>Dear Colleague,as you know I organize every year a Neuroendoscopy workshop at the end of January . This year the dates will be 26-28 January 2015.All details can be seen at the following link: http://www.centrodibiotecnologie.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Flyer-European-Workshop-Neuroendoscopy-2015.pdf This is a very nice event, not expensive (300 euros registration), with many high level lectures by world reknown neuroendoscopists, and 15 hours of hands-on training on anatomical models and on rat models, 17 working stations with full time high level tutoring. Eight of the Working stations [...] Ganesalingam Narenthiran 2014-11-29T13:43:32+00:00 2014-11-29T13:43:32+00:00 ISNP Paediatric Neurosurgery Guide https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BNRG;3481ee2f.1411 Babaji<br>Dear Listserv Members,I learn from Dr Rick Abbott, that the highly regarded 'Paediatric Neurosurgery Guide' of the ISPN has moved to a simpler domain name: http://ispn.guide to enable easy access. Should you be interested in contributing to the Guide, you might wish to contact Dr Abbott, its Editor-in-chief at rickabbott@me.com.<br>You might wish to make link to it from your departmental web-pages (or blog-sites) for the benefit of your colleagues and trainees.<br>Thank you and warm regards!<br>Naren
